# Formatting



# Bray-Curtis distance


```{r}
bc.plot %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = tissue, y = distance)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_bw()
ggsave("../../figures/bray-curtis_vat-lung-pellet.png")
```
